runs.comm: short of a length on off stump, Warner hops and defends it down. Bounce and pace already conspicuous on this track.
length ball, on leg stump, Warner gets forward and looks to flick but can't get it away
sliding down leg and Warner makes connection with the nudge to square leg. He is away
ooh, big left from just back of a length, and took Watto by surprise as he shaped to cut. Thudded into the keeper's gloves at good pace
good line, slightly fuller outside off, Watson opens the face and runs it down to third man
on middle and off, draws Warner out and he off drives without much power straight to mid off. Good start from Mortaza
short of a length and Watto cannot capitalise. He mistimes the pull, a trifle early into the shot and it goes straight to midwicket
slides down the leg side for the first wide of the day
angles in and raps him on the pads in front of middle and leg. Good ball, but it was sliding down the leg
length ball angling into Watto who gets on the front foot and swings his arms to send it over midwicket. Not timed too well, still gets a couple
straight ball on middle, dropped to the leg side for a single
he's smashed the cover off that one! Short of a length and angling across Warner without much pace, he had enough room to free his arms and swat that high over long off. Clean hit
goes the other way, it was marginally fuller and straighter this time, so Warner decided to despatch it over mid on. One bounce over the ropes.

Watto's gotta go! Mashrafe bowled a great first over, and now gets his reward with a very well-directed bouncer. That was fast and directed at Watto's body, he was hustled into the pull and was quite late on it. The top edge went high and when it came down, it landed in the hands of Aftab Ahmed who took a good tumbling catch.
great lines from Mortaza, short of a length, pushing Warner back as it angles across, defends off the back foot, without having any room to play an aggressove shot
this time, he gives him an inch, and Warner makes a yard out of it. Just outside off, and cut away with fierce power and perfect placement through the covers
cross batted hard to mid on, where it is fielded well, tumbling to the right
case of ball hitting the bat! Good signs for the tournament, this pitch is nice and quick. mashrafe bangs it in short of a length and Clarke hangs back and defends to the off side
good finish to the over, short of a length again with a little shape away from Clarke and good carry. The Aussie captain makes the right decision - do nothing
good start from Shakib, troubles Warner outside off

and he gets his second ball! Warner does not play spin very well, and the previous ball sowed some seeds of doubt in his head, possibly. He was down the track this time, did not get to the pitch as it turned into him and still went with the loft over midwicket. He did not time it too well and the catch was taken well by the fielder running in
speared into the right hander, who defended it straight
shortens the length marginally, he gets forward and defends
some turn on offer, squared Clarke up as he looked to turn it to the leg side and hit his pads.
wallop! Clarke dictates terms to his opposite number in authoritative fashion. Down the track, inside out, with the spin straight over long off. Beautiful shot that
short of a length, outside off, pushes back and defended to the offside
worked away to the leg side this time
short of a length again outside off cut away to cover
well run, tight line on leg turning to middle, defended to the leg side and they steal a single
works the short ball away behind square on the leg side for a single
good shot and great fielding. That was short of a length, he came down the track and drove it well, very straight and Shakib dived from mid on to save a few
driven down to mid off this time and well run for a quick single. They took on the fielder this time
drifting on to the pads and Haddin is unable to exact full toll. Misses the swing to leg side, but gets a leg bye
angles in again, from outside off on to leg and Clarke can't do much with it as he looks to work it away into the leg side

oooh, another tight single and I dare say a direct hit could have had them sweating. Good length again, short of a length and he could not time the cover drive. It went straight to cover, but the fielder could not get in a good throw
drilled straight back and Shafiul does well to half stop it and it nearly hits the stumps at the bowler's end
length outside off, defended off the backfoot
short and wide, rocks back and cuts it away nicely for a couple

gotcha! Do we have an upset brewing here! Haddin plays an airy-fairy lofted sweep over square leg, just that he was no where near the pitch of the ball and ended up top-edging a dolly to short third man
short of a length, on legstump and straightening. Defended to cover
big turn, ripping across the batsman who stayed back and defended
Clarke comes down the track this time and flicks it to mid on.
big spinner first up, but short of a length, he gets it down behind square on the leg side
slips down the leg for a wide
played down to mid on this time for a single
similar shot, comes down the track and plays to mid on
good line, spinning into the batsman, who flicks airlily to midwicket
misfield. Plays the flick again, straight to the fielder in the circle who let it go and they ran well to steal a second
pitched up on leg stump, comes down the track and flicks to midwicket
and again, similar line and length, played in identical fashion to midwicket
grips and turns! From leg to outside off, batsman stays back and tries to work it away to the leg side
almost gone! Spin again, gets the outside edge as he looks for an expansive cover drive, and it almost carries to short third man
uses the feet to get to the ball and plays down to long off
full ball driven to long on for one
jumps out and gets to the pitch this time, drives powerfully down the ground
pitched up on leg stump, driven powerfully to long on

the skipper is gone! Australia are stuttering here, and Clarke's played an unnecessary shot to give his wicket away. Pitched up on off stump, Clarke was out of his crease and looked to loft it over long off, but did not hit it well enough to clear the ropes. It went straight to the fielder in the outfield

Dropped by Jahurul at long off! Hussey plays a carbon copy of Clarke's brain-freeze shot, but times it a little worse, so jahurul had to run in, he got to the ball, and then put it down as he was tumbling forward.
played away with the turn to long on to get off the mark
played away to the covers for a single
length ball on off stump, guided off the back foot in front of point for one
short of a length outside off, punched off the backfoot to cover

it's all happening! Played softly off the backfoot straight to point, and Hussey hustles across for a quick single as the fielder swoops in and under-arms a throw that misses. He would have been in, in any case

Australia have lost half their side! Another well-directed bouncer from Mortaza, hurrying Hussey into the pull shot, the top edge balloons behind square on the leg side, Mushfiqur runs across and takes it with the big gloves. Game on folks!
short ball again, gets good lift to push the batsman back and he fends it to the legside
sliding down leg, worked away nicely square on the leg side for one
worked away with the spin between point and cover for one
pitched up on leg, driven firmly down to wide long on
short of a length, cut away into the covers
patted back down to the off side, for no run
pitched up on off stump, opens the face and plays it to the covers
pitched up outside off, straightening, turned away to midwicket
full outside off, looks for the deft dab to third man, does not play it so deftly though
full on off, driven to long on off the front foot

See you later Mr. White! Lovely bit of left-arm spin bowling from Shakib, White tried to double guess him by moving to the leg side, Shakib stuck to his guns and bowled the stock ball on leg and middle, it turned away and beat White's attempted prod to crash into the furniture!
pitched up, Smith is down the track and gets to the pitch to drive to wide long on and get off the mark
pitched up outside off, gets forward and flicks it behind square
nicely played and well run, played away to the covers - it is Hussey's favourite shot, and they get a couple
rocks back and whips this one on to the leg side
swept away square to the deep for a single

pitched up on off, Hussey drops it to point and takes off for a tight single. A direct hit could have got him, he put in a big dive to get in. What's more, he was alert to get up and return for the overthrow
works it away to the legside this time to keep the score-card ticking. Hussey is crucial to the cause
misses the reverse sweep, and it slides down the leg side, but it is not called a wide, correctly so
stays in the crease and works it from the leg stump into the leg side, played well into the gap with soft hands
a boundary at long last, slightly short and Hussey latches on with the pull behind square. Finds the gap to a nicety
misses the pull this time, but it slides down for a wide
pitched up on off, dabbed to the off side for a quickie
tries to sweep a straight ball and misses. The bounce probably saved him, that was a good shout for lbw
looks to step out and drive, does not get to the pitch and the attempted drive pops in the air, but lands safely before reaching the bowler
overpitched on off stump, Hussey gets forward and drives to wide long off
full outside off, Hussey can't make connection as he gets his bat down outside off
again full outside off, Hussey drives it straight to cover where the fielder Shakib fumbles
short ball, and a shifty Stephen Smith looks to pull from outside off, it goes down to long on
again drives straight to Shakib who fumbles and Hussey gladly steals a single
nicely played, it was short of a length outside off, Smith unfurled a nice looking square drive, that went to the left of point. It was tagged by third man running across near the ropes
Incredible timing! Full toss on leg stump, but they still have to be out away. Hussey stood his ground and flicked it nonchalantly over square leg for a six
works this one behind square for a single. Hussey is playing a wonderful hand here
ah, he misses out with the paddle sweep. Times it well from the leg stump line, but it goes straight to the only fielder in that region, inside the circle

Mashrafe is losing the plot after a fine spell until now. This one again is on leg stump, as all the previous balls this over, with fine leg in the circle. Hussey says thank you very much mate and redirects the ball behind square leg
expertly played! Finally Ashrafe gets it outside off, but there was enough room for Hussey to make a measured surgical cut to send it scurrying fine to the third man fence
cuts it away hard straight to cover for a single. Great over for Aus.
Wah! Reverse sweep from Hussey, that was a full toss outside off, Hussey spotted the gap behind square and sent the ball to the fence with a backhand swat
bunts this one down to long on to turn the strike over
Shot! Smith is down the track, gets to the pitch and uncorks a perfect extra-coverdrive, high elbow and good follow through, couple of bounces for four
gets this away straight down the ground for a single
Hussey gets down the track and drives to long off for a single
Smith goes for the reverse sweep this time and fails to make connection, that missed the stumps by a thin margin
Butchered! Shorter boundary on the leg side, and Smith went for it, with the expansive hoick over midwicket. Times perfectly
down the track and goes through with the drive to extra cover
swings it to the leg side and takes another tight single
Smith smashed that to smithereens! Short of a length this time, he stays back and plays a violent pull, timing it well to send it flying over midwicket. The Smith family will be proud!
looks to swing it away again, but cannot get it away this time
gets forward and looks to sweep, but misses. It trickles off the pads.
full and very wide outside off, he does well to get bat on to that and it dribbles away to point
good ball, follows the batsman as he moves to the leg side, and cramps him for room. Smith gets it down to long on
good death bowling from Shafiul, he keeps it full outside off and Hussey can't get under it or time the swipe to long on. Just a single
another good yorker on leg stump, Smith does what he can and works it away to short fine leg for a single

Hussey jumps out to convert the yorker into a hittable ball and takes it on the full, he drives it from outside off to the left of the fielder at long on who does extremely well to cover ground and fire in a sharp throw, but the bowler fails to collect cleanly as he tries to break the stumps. That is a missed run-out chance.

Smith is run out. That was very wide outside off and Hussey could not connect as he stretched out. Smith was eager to run across and nearly made his ground, but Rahim's under-arm got him just short of the crease. Great innings from Smith
Harris drives to long off without any timing, so there was enough time to come back for the second. Good last over from Bangladesh, despite going for seven off the last two balls
